title: Go Fundamentals Value Types
description: This challenge aims to test your understanding of Golang's basic value types, including strings, integers, floats, and booleans.

meta.title: Golang Basics | Value Types | Programming Tutorial
meta.description: Learn Golang's fundamental value types like strings, integers, floats, and booleans. Complete the 'calculate' function to practice basic programming concepts.
meta.keywords: Golang, programming, value types, strings, integers, floats, booleans, tutorial
